sections.title: SECTION C: Facility Readiness to Provide Dispensing Services

subSections.title: C.1 Staffing Level

inputRows.label: Are the following staff available at a facility on the day of the visit?
If yes is there clinician for dispensing medication
If yes is there at least one Pharmaceutical Technician
2. Is this facility a District/Regional/Referral Hospital
If yes is there at least one Pharmacist

subSections.instruction: Instructions: Determine the number of staff members present at the facility on the day of the visit depending on the level

subSections.title: C.2 Staff Training

inputRows.label: Number of staff working at the dispensing/pharmacy

Number of staff working at the dispensing/pharmacy who have received training on electronic Logistics Management System (eLMIS) 
eLMIS not applicable for Private sector

subSections.instruction: Instruction: Supervisor, enquire about staff who have received eLMIS training

subSections.title: C.3 Reference Materials

inputRows.label: Are the Job aid/manual on the treatment of malaria using ACT+ Primaquine available?
Is the current Zanzibar Guideline for Malaria Diagnosis and Treatment available?
Is the malaria Case Management job aid/manual on Artesunate injection reconstitution available?

subSections.instruction: Are the following reference materials for malaria case management available and accessible at this facility? Verify availability, if the material is obtained with minimal effort or put on the table then it is accessible

subSections.instruction: Check the following information system tools

subSections.title: C.5 Essential Equipment-Store Room

inputRows.label: Are the following available in the store room on the day of the visit?
Lock and key for the store
Shelves for supplies and commodities storage
Pallets or equivalent to keep boxes above floor level
Expired/unserviceable stock separated from facility usable stock
Commodity stored away from direct sunlight

subSections.instruction: Instructions: Verify that each of the following essential equipment’s/supplies are available at the facility.

subSections.title: C.6 Essential Equipment-Injection Room

inputRows.label: Are the following available in the injection room on the day of the visit?

subSections.instruction: Instructions: Verify that each of the following essential equipment’s/supplies are available at the injection room.

subSections.title: C.7 Essential Equipment-Dispensing Site/Area

inputRows.label: Are the following available in the dispensing site/area on the day of the visit?

subSections.instruction: Instructions: Verify that each of the following essential equipment’s/supplies are available at the dispensing site/area.

inputRows.label: mRDT kits are protected from direct sunlight
mRDT kits are protected from humidity, rain or water
Are there  no mRDTs kits/device expired
mRDTs used on first expired first out basis
Is store ledger available for mRDT
Is mRDT information up to date
There is a  two way thermometer at the mRDT storage site
SUB-SCORE: C.8 General mRDT storage conditions scores

subSections.title: Section C.: Health Facility Logistics Readiness Score
subSections.instruction: Instructions: Calculate Total Section Score by averaging  section  Scores

sections.title: Section D. Dispensing Observations

inputRows.label: Record the medicine in the daily dispensing register?
Correctly instruct the patient on medicine use?
Ask the patient to repeat instructions on medicine use?
Explain to the patient any other instructions given by the clinician?

sections.instruction:
Instructions: Observe the dispenser while dispensing medicines to patients with fever. If a facility has more than one dispenser observations should be made to different dispensers, if there is only one dispenser then all observations should be done on that dispenser. Do not interrupt unless the patient is severely ill or if the practice of the dispenser would put the patient in danger. If a patient is severely ill, then the supervisor should help refer patient to relevant clinicians for care. If there is no client, simulation should be done.
Did the health provider do the following?

sections.title: Section F. Stock outs and expiry of malaria commodities

inputRows.label: Qtr: write months of the quarter reviewed
Was there a stock out of the item for 7 days or more in the last 3 months?
Was there a stock out of the item on the day of the visit?
Were the quantity of commodities that were expiring within three months greater than the quantity of consumable stocks?

SCORE 
 F.1 No stock-outs of malaria commodities

sections.instruction: If no stock out or expired commodities, check the box “no” (assigned score of 1).

subSections.title: G.1 Logistics DQA Readiness(Not applicable for Private facilities)

inputRows.label: Is there a staff assigned for recording monthly or summary forms for eLMIS?
Is the R&R filled accordingly at the health facility?
Is there separate staff who create R&R
Is there a staff designated for reviewing filled and authorize R&R prior to submission to the DHMT level?
Has the relevant staff received training on electronic Logistic Management Information System(eLMIS)?
Does the facility has written guidelines (Zanzibar Integrated Logistics System -ZILS guideline) to the service delivery point on reporting requirements and deadlines?
Does the Medicine and Therapeutic committee of the facility use Logistic data for Planning and decision making? (Applicable for Cottage ,District, Regional  and Referral hospitals)
SCORE: SECTION: G.1 Logistics - DQA Readiness

subSections.instruction: Instructions: Interviews the person or person(s) involved in Logistics data entry and management at the facility to complete this section.

subSections.title: G.2 Ledger Documentation and Consistency Check(Not applicable at Private sector)

inputRows.label: Received in a ledger (last 3 months cycle)
Ledger balance on the day of the visit
Quantity received last three months cycle in sales Invoice from CMS
Physical count on the day of visit at the store
Is the documented in the correct unit in the ledger
Physical count of the commodities that will expire within three months
Sub score G.2 Ledger documentation and Consistency Check Score
